<h2>Connect to the database</h2>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb8"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb8-1"><a href="#cb8-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>se <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">new.env</span>()</span>
<span id="cb8-2"><a href="#cb8-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb8-3"><a href="#cb8-3" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>conn_eurodiad <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">dbConnect</span>(</span>
<span id="cb8-4"><a href="#cb8-4" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  RPostgres<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">Postgres</span>(), </span>
<span id="cb8-5"><a href="#cb8-5" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">dbname =</span> <span class="st">&#39;eurodiad&#39;</span>,</span>
<span id="cb8-6"><a href="#cb8-6" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">host =</span> <span class="st">&#39;&lt;your-host&gt;&#39;</span>,</span>
<span id="cb8-7"><a href="#cb8-7" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">port =</span> <span class="dv">5432</span>,</span>
<span id="cb8-8"><a href="#cb8-8" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">user =</span> <span class="st">&#39;&lt;your-username&gt;&#39;</span>,</span>
<span id="cb8-9"><a href="#cb8-9" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">password =</span> rstudioapi<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">askForPassword</span>(<span class="st">&quot;Database password&quot;</span>))</span>
<span id="cb8-10"><a href="#cb8-10" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb8-11"><a href="#cb8-11" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>session<span class="sc">$</span>userData<span class="sc">$</span>con <span class="ot">&lt;-</span>conn_eurodiad</span></code></pre></div>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb9"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb9-1"><a href="#cb9-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># For ThinkR only</span></span>
<span id="cb9-2"><a href="#cb9-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>se <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">new.env</span>()</span>

<span id="cb9-4"><a href="#cb9-4" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>DBI<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">dbListTables</span>(conn_eurodiad)</span></code></pre></div>

<div id="explore-data" class="section level2">
<h2>Explore data</h2>
<p>It is recommended to use <code>tbl()</code> instead of
<code>dbGetQuery()</code> to connect to a table in the database.<br />
<code>tbl()</code> does not download the table, it only connect to the
database and let it run the query. This means that if you run a
<code>filter()</code> or a <code>mutate()</code> after that, the
database executes it, not R, which is more efficient.<br />
However, at some point, some of your {tidyverse} operations can not be
realised or translated in SQL, hence, you need to download the resulting
dataset using <code>collect()</code>. Then you can continue as
usual.</p>
<p>For instance.</p>
<ul>
<li><code>dbGetQuery()</code> download data in R
<ul>
<li><code>filter()</code> is executed by R in your R session</li>
</ul></li>
<li>Note that <code>!!</code> is a specific to using {dplyr} with SQL
there.
<ul>
<li>This is because the variable after it (e.g. <code>species_id</code>)
is defined in the R session, but not in the database. Therefore, before
sending the SQL query to the database, R has to transform the variable
by its real value in R. Otherwise, it will send the word
<code>&quot;species_id&quot;</code> which does not make sense for the SQL
database, instead of the number you wanted to put.</li>
</ul></li>
</ul>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb11"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb11-1"><a href="#cb11-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># Create a function</span></span>
<span id="cb11-2"><a href="#cb11-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>get_data_dbi <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="cf">function</span>(conn_eurodiad, species_id, scenario) {</span>
<span id="cb11-3"><a href="#cb11-3" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  query <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="st">&quot;SELECT * FROM diadesatlas.v_hybrid_model&quot;</span></span>
<span id="cb11-4"><a href="#cb11-4" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </span>
<span id="cb11-5"><a href="#cb11-5" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">dbGetQuery</span>(conn_eurodiad, query) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb11-6"><a href="#cb11-6" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    <span class="fu">filter</span>(species_id <span class="sc">%in%</span> <span class="sc">!!</span>species_id,</span>
<span id="cb11-7"><a href="#cb11-7" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>           climatic_scenario <span class="sc">%in%</span> <span class="sc">!!</span>scenario) </span>
<span id="cb11-8"><a href="#cb11-8" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>}</span>
<span id="cb11-9"><a href="#cb11-9" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb11-10"><a href="#cb11-10" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># Use it</span></span>
<span id="cb11-11"><a href="#cb11-11" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="fu">get_data_dbi</span>(conn_eurodiad,</span>
<span id="cb11-12"><a href="#cb11-12" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>             <span class="at">species_id =</span> <span class="fu">c</span>(<span class="dv">6</span>),</span>
<span id="cb11-13"><a href="#cb11-13" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>             <span class="at">scenario =</span> <span class="st">&#39;rcp85&#39;</span>)</span></code></pre></div>

<ul>
<li><code>tbl()</code> only connects to the table, only a glimpse of the
data is presented
<ul>
<li><code>filter()</code> is run by the SQL database</li>
</ul></li>
</ul>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb13"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb13-1"><a href="#cb13-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>get_data_tbl <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="cf">function</span>(conn_eurodiad, species_id, scenario) {</span>
<span id="cb13-2"><a href="#cb13-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">tbl</span>(conn_eurodiad, <span class="st">&quot;v_hybrid_model&quot;</span>) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span> </span>
<span id="cb13-3"><a href="#cb13-3" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    <span class="fu">filter</span>(species_id <span class="sc">%in%</span> <span class="sc">!!</span>species_id,</span>
<span id="cb13-4"><a href="#cb13-4" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>           climatic_scenario <span class="sc">%in%</span> <span class="sc">!!</span>scenario) </span>
<span id="cb13-5"><a href="#cb13-5" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>}</span>
<span id="cb13-6"><a href="#cb13-6" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb13-7"><a href="#cb13-7" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># Use it</span></span>
<span id="cb13-8"><a href="#cb13-8" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="fu">get_data_tbl</span>(conn_eurodiad,</span>
<span id="cb13-9"><a href="#cb13-9" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>             <span class="at">species_id =</span> <span class="fu">c</span>(<span class="dv">6</span>),</span>
<span id="cb13-10"><a href="#cb13-10" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>             <span class="at">scenario =</span> <span class="st">&#39;rcp85&#39;</span>)</span></code></pre></div>
<pre><code>## # Source:   lazy query [?? x
## #   17]
## # Database: postgres
## #   [diadesatlas_owner@localhost:5432/diades]
##    hybrid_model_resu… basin_id
##                 &lt;int&gt;    &lt;int&gt;
##  1              61610       15
##  2              61611       15
##  3              61612       15

##  5              61614       15

## # … with more rows, and 15

## #   species_id &lt;int&gt;,

<ul>
<li>If you need to create some {ggplot2} figures after that, you can
collect</li>
</ul>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb15"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb15-1"><a href="#cb15-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>get_data_tbl_collect <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="cf">function</span>(conn_eurodiad, species_id, scenario) {</span>
<span id="cb15-2"><a href="#cb15-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">tbl</span>(conn_eurodiad, <span class="st">&quot;v_hybrid_model&quot;</span>) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span> </span>
<span id="cb15-3"><a href="#cb15-3" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    <span class="fu">filter</span>(species_id <span class="sc">%in%</span> <span class="sc">!!</span>species_id,</span>
<span id="cb15-4"><a href="#cb15-4" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>           climatic_scenario <span class="sc">%in%</span> <span class="sc">!!</span>scenario) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span> </span>
<span id="cb15-5"><a href="#cb15-5" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    <span class="co"># From collect(), the full data is in the R session</span></span>
<span id="cb15-6"><a href="#cb15-6" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    <span class="fu">collect</span>()</span>
<span id="cb15-7"><a href="#cb15-7" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>}</span>
<span id="cb15-8"><a href="#cb15-8" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb15-9"><a href="#cb15-9" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># Use it</span></span>
<span id="cb15-10"><a href="#cb15-10" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="fu">get_data_tbl_collect</span>(conn_eurodiad,</span>
<span id="cb15-11"><a href="#cb15-11" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>                     <span class="at">species_id =</span> <span class="fu">c</span>(<span class="dv">6</span>),</span>
<span id="cb15-12"><a href="#cb15-12" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>                     <span class="at">scenario =</span> <span class="st">&#39;rcp85&#39;</span>) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span> </span>
<span id="cb15-13"><a href="#cb15-13" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">filter</span>(basin_id <span class="sc">==</span> <span class="dv">1</span>) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span> </span>
<span id="cb15-14"><a href="#cb15-14" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">ggplot</span>(<span class="fu">aes</span>(<span class="at">x =</span> year)) <span class="sc">+</span></span>
<span id="cb15-15"><a href="#cb15-15" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">geom_line</span>(<span class="fu">aes</span>(<span class="at">y =</span> hsi))</span></code></pre></div>
<p><img src="data:image/png;base64," /><!-- --></p>
<ul>
<li>Note that you can use a full SQL query with <code>tbl()</code></li>
</ul>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb16"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb16-1"><a href="#cb16-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>get_data_tbl_query_collect <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="cf">function</span>(conn_eurodiad, species_id, scenario) {</span>
<span id="cb16-2"><a href="#cb16-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  query <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="st">&quot;SELECT * FROM diadesatlas.v_hybrid_model&quot;</span></span>
<span id="cb16-3"><a href="#cb16-3" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </span>
<span id="cb16-4"><a href="#cb16-4" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">tbl</span>(conn_eurodiad, <span class="fu">sql</span>(query)) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span> </span>
<span id="cb16-5"><a href="#cb16-5" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    <span class="co"># Adds a filter to be run as SQL in the database</span></span>
<span id="cb16-6"><a href="#cb16-6" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    <span class="fu">filter</span>(species_id <span class="sc">%in%</span> <span class="sc">!!</span>species_id,</span>
<span id="cb16-7"><a href="#cb16-7" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>           climatic_scenario <span class="sc">%in%</span> <span class="sc">!!</span>scenario) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span> </span>
<span id="cb16-8"><a href="#cb16-8" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    <span class="co"># From collect(), the full data is in the R session</span></span>
<span id="cb16-9"><a href="#cb16-9" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    <span class="fu">collect</span>()</span>
<span id="cb16-10"><a href="#cb16-10" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>}</span>
<span id="cb16-11"><a href="#cb16-11" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb16-12"><a href="#cb16-12" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># Use it</span></span>
<span id="cb16-13"><a href="#cb16-13" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="fu">get_data_tbl_query_collect</span>(conn_eurodiad,</span>
<span id="cb16-14"><a href="#cb16-14" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>                           <span class="at">species_id =</span> <span class="fu">c</span>(<span class="dv">6</span>),</span>
<span id="cb16-15"><a href="#cb16-15" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>                           <span class="at">scenario =</span> <span class="st">&#39;rcp85&#39;</span>) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span> </span>
<span id="cb16-16"><a href="#cb16-16" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">filter</span>(basin_id <span class="sc">==</span> <span class="dv">1</span>) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span> </span>
<span id="cb16-17"><a href="#cb16-17" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">ggplot</span>(<span class="fu">aes</span>(<span class="at">x =</span> year)) <span class="sc">+</span></span>
<span id="cb16-18"><a href="#cb16-18" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">geom_line</span>(<span class="fu">aes</span>(<span class="at">y =</span> hsi))</span></code></pre></div>
<p><img src="data:image/png;base64," /><!-- --></p>
</div>
<div id="disconnect-from-the-database" class="section level2">
<h2>Disconnect from the database</h2>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb17"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb17-1"><a href="#cb17-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>DBI<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">dbDisconnect</span>(conn_eurodiad)</span></code></pre></div>
</div>
